ygData.subject: Re: Spell Resistance - the reason
ygData.msgSnippet: i have enchanter friend, and i pretty much use the same combo (she doesn t like to use tashan or whatever, but i told her she had no choice with me :). she
ygData.messageBody:
i have enchanter friend, and i pretty much use the same combo (she doesn't
like to use tashan or whatever, but i told her she had no choice with me :).
she lowers mr, then i cast force then flame, then melee, or cast one more
flame (we dont normally root when grouped as the monster never lives long
enough to do any real dmg). when solo'ing, i just dont use force anymore.
too much of a chance for a resist, and if that happens, im stuck with root
(enstill still gets resisted too often), then flame, flame, flame and hope
it goes down (i know, i should be using bolt, but i hate it when it misses).
my 2h blunt (72 maxed), dodge (67), and defense (83) skills are high enough
that i can stand for a bit, but if they resist force, then they resist root,
i'm gonna think about runnin' (mind u, this does happen quite often when i
solo... and it sux. hope it gets better at 24 with frost shock).

Sinlaru Ce`alen
Rallos Zek


-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Lee <kenlee@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 27, 1999 11:22 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Spell Resistance - the reason


>From: "Ken Lee" <kenlee@...>
>
>Well, I'll admit that I haven't gotten any real 'experience' with using it.
>Not countless battles and such. I'll be hitting Aviak central tonight, and
>will post my results tomorrow on a whole night of using it. Anyone got any
>really good spell combos they use? My preferred burn is the following right
>now:
>
>Force Shock
>Lightning Bolt
>Root
>Flame Shock
>
>Around 400 pts of dmg. Haven't seen any blue that took that damage and
lived
>aside from Named beasts.
>
>Before Force Shock I had to have a tank or I'd be running half the time
from
>blues.
>
>BTW, with my enchanter friend we pack a MEAN punch, she'll lower magic
>resistance I bomb, she whirls I step back and burn. Easy way to take reds
>and yellows. Make friends with enchanters. you'll never regret it.
>
>Zalbar The Mad
>20th Wizard
>Solusek Ro
>
